thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Indel B Sells 8 Pct Stake in Guangdong Indel B To Shanghai Junzhi Enterprise Management

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indel B Sells 8 Pct Stake in Guangdong Indel B To Shanghai Junzhi Enterprise Management
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - INDEL B SPA:
* SAID ON TUESDAY SHANGHAI JUNZHI ENTERPRISE MANAGEMENT HAD ENTERED THE SHARE CAPITAL OF GUANGDONG INDEL B WITH AN 8 PCT STAKE
* SHANGHAI JUNZHI ENTERPRISE MANAGEMENT IS A STRATEGIC MARKETING COMPANY IN CHINA
* INDEL Bâ€˜S STAKE IN GUANGDONG INDEL B WILL DECREASE FROM 40 PCT TO 36.8 PCT
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
